title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 4217.6 - Calculation, distribution of pools
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 4217.6 - Calculation, distribution of pools

State Regulations

The daily double pool shall be calculated and
distributed as follows: the net pool divided by the amount wagered on the
winning combination determines the payoff per dollar bet. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
4217.6

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
